column1: 8 pts: The identified business function (production and distribution) could benefit from scrum/sprint, but the explanation could be more specific. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. The response provides some information on how scrum/sprint and kanban could be implemented, but it lacks specific details on how they would operate for the chosen business functions.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at discussing the poor fit of kanban for production and distribution functions. However, it would be helpful to provide more specific reasons and examples to strengthen your argument. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Great job identifying the production function as a suitable area for implementing kanban methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could operate. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good effort in explaining the benefits of Kanban for the production function, but could provide more details on the specific steps and columns in the Kanban board.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good effort in discussing the implementation of scrum/sprint in production and distribution functions. However, the explanation of why scrum/sprint is a poor fit for other functions could be clearer and more specific. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying confirmation bias as a relevant issue in this situation. Keep up the good work!

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition. 

Comment: You mentioned confirmation bias, but the definition provided was not clear and concise. Please revise your definition and provide a more focused explanation of the bias.
10 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. Good effort in explaining the implementation of methodologies, but could use more clarity and detail in certain areas. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. Good effort in explaining the implementation of scrum/sprint and Kanban methodologies, but could use more specific details on the steps or actions involved. Keep up the good work!
